examples.example: 每天乘坐公交车去上班，能欣赏沿途的风景，感觉很惬意。

translate.english: Take the bus to work every day, can enjoy the scenery along the way, and feel very comfortable.

examples.example: 我每天都会准时乘坐公交车去学校，开启元气满满的一天。

translate.english: I take the bus to school on time every day to start a day full of vitality.

examples.example: 我喜欢坐在公交车上，看城市的热闹与美好。

translate.english: I like sitting on the bus and watching the bustle and beauty of the city.
